attributes.title: Please donâ€™t get this app
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch like crazy and overall when I did get it to work, the layout was horrible and it was extremely hard to navigate. I kept getting pop ups on my phone, my phone would shut completely off and I wouldnâ€™t be able to turn it back on for at least a couple of hours. Please DONT GET THIS APP!

On my pillow
Can't get me tired
Sharing my fragile truth
That I still hope the door is open
'Cause the window
Opened one time with you and me
Now my forever's falling down
Wondering if you'd want me now
How could I know
One day I'd wake up feeling more
But I had already reached the shore
Guess we were ships in the night
Night, night
Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo
Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo
We were ships in the night, night, night
I'm wondering
Are you my best friend
Feel's like a river's rushing through my mind
I wanna ask you
If this is all just in my head
My heart is pounding tonight
I wonder
If you
Are too good to be true
And would it be alright if I
Pulled you closerâ€¦

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I never rate apps, but this one was a true disappointment and I donâ€™t want my fellow patriotic Americans to go through what I went through. This app needs a lot more work. It took 3 days to download, and during that time, I had to endure the beeping noise it made while downloading. I was very concerned. But after those 3 gruesome days, I was able to rid my phone of this monstrosity.

attributes.title: All these reviews are fake
attributes.review: The app took 30 seconds to download and works fine. The bad reviews are from the liberal tiktok trying to get the app taken down.
